meanings.sent1: The farmer used a nematocide to protect his crops from pests.
meanings.sent2: The nematocide effectively eliminated the harmful worms in the soil.
meanings.sent3: The nematocide worked so well that even the worms were impressed!
meanings.sent4: The nematocide was like a superhero swooping in to save the plants from nematode villains.
meanings.sent5: The nematocide's power to destroy nematodes was unmatched.

meanings.sent1: The nematocide of the garden was necessary to protect the vegetables.
meanings.sent2: She observed the nematocide in action as it eradicated the harmful pests.
meanings.sent3: The nematocide's victory dance after eliminating the nematodes was quite a sight!
meanings.sent4: The nematocide's relentless pursuit of nematodes was like a thrilling chase scene in a movie.
meanings.sent5: The nematocide's efficiency in nematode extermination was truly remarkable.
